Description:
------------
Lords of Football is a new simulator athletic lifestyle, which is played from the perspective of a god. The daily grind of football comes alive, thanks to simulation training to improve the skills of the players. Furthermore, we can live all the drama and real-life events that occur throughout the season. With simple navigation, in which you just have to drag and drop, know the personalities of the players, who have to supervise while not losing sight of the resources we have and, well, get your team to compete in international tournaments. The game takes place in an immersive 3D world, where you can customize your team, and whose success will give improvements for the club and football simulation will be even more exciting and lively.
